28 namespace tbb {
29 
31 
32 class queuing_mutex : internal::mutex_copy_deprecated_and_disabled {
33 public:
35  queuing_mutex() {
36  q_tail = NULL;
37 #if TBB_USE_THREADING_TOOLS
38  internal_construct();
39 #endif
40  }
41 
43 
45  class scoped_lock: internal::no_copy {
47  void initialize() {
48  mutex = NULL;
49  going = 0;
50 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
51  internal::poison_pointer(next);
52 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
53  }
54 
55  public:
57 
58  scoped_lock() {initialize();}
59 
61  scoped_lock( queuing_mutex& m ) {
62  initialize();
63  acquire(m);
64  }
65 
67  ~scoped_lock() {
68  if( mutex ) release();
69  }
70 
72  void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD acquire( queuing_mutex& m );
73 
75  bool __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD try_acquire( queuing_mutex& m );
76 
78  void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD release();
79 
80  private:
82  queuing_mutex* mutex;
83 
85  scoped_lock *next;
86 
88 
91  uintptr_t going;
92  };
93 
94  void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_construct();
95 
96  // Mutex traits
97  static const bool is_rw_mutex = false;
98  static const bool is_recursive_mutex = false;
99  static const bool is_fair_mutex = true;
100 
101 private:
103  atomic<scoped_lock*> q_tail;
104 
105 };
106 
107 __TBB_DEFINE_PROFILING_SET_NAME(queuing_mutex)
108 
109 } // namespace tbb

111 #endif /* __TBB_queuing_mutex_H */
